text: True Colors is a 1991 American drama movie directed by Herbert Ross and starring James Spader, John Cusack, Imogen Stubbs, Richard Widmark, Mandy Patinkin, Paul Guilfoyle. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 drama movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross
title: True Colors (1991 movie)
